mapper.insert: insert into userorder (order_id, order_userid, order_receiverlocation, order_receiverphone, order_receiver, order_number, order_book_number, order_book_name, oder_book_image1, order_price, order_amount, order_refund, order_refund_status, order_refund_start_time, order_refund_dispose_time, order_refund_end_time, order_sales_return, order_sales_return_status, order_sales_return_start_time, order_sales_return_end_time, order_payment_status, order_receive_status, order_evaluation_level, order_evalution_description, order_evaluation_image, order_creation_time, order_creation_batch, order_message, order_totalnumber, order_totalprice, order_status, order_remark1, order_remark2) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderReceiverlocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderReceiverphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderReceiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderBookNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderBookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oderBookImage1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderRefund,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderRefundStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderRefundStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderRefundDisposeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderRefundEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderSalesReturn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderSalesReturnStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderSalesReturnStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderSalesReturnEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderPaymentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderReceiveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderEvaluationLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderEvalutionDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderEvaluationImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCreationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCreationBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTotalnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTotalprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderRemark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderRemark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select * from userorder where order_userid=#{userId} and order_status != '0' limit #{start},#{end}
select * from userorder where order_userid=#{userId} and order_status != '0' order by order_creation_batch desc
